product_name: Living ProofPerfect hair Day High-Shine Gloss
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof Perfect hair Day High-Shine Gloss is a silicone-free, in-shower gloss that provides 2x more shine*.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides mirror-like shine that lasts through 3 washes*.Instantly adds high shine and enhances vibrancy for lasting resultsSmooths the cuticle and aligns hair fibers delivering an ultra-glossy, glass-like finishDetangles and improves slip, leaving hair silky, soft, and more manageableA lightweight silicone-free formula that won't weigh hair downFormulated for all hair types*Laboratory testing vs. untreated.Key IngredientsLight Enhancing Technology: A blend of a high gloss emollient and an optical brightener that creates more visible light on hair, delivering a mirror-like finish.Proprietary Smoothing Technology: Improves spreadability and helps align hair fibers.Ceramide-like Emollient: Helps seal cuticles to smooth the surface of the hair.Formulated WithoutSilicones, sulfates (SLS + SLES), parabens, phthalates, and formaldehyde. PETA-certified cruelty-free, color safe, Keratin-safe, and safe for chemically treated hair.Item 2624095How To UseShampoo and condition hair. Remove excess water. Generously saturate roots to ends. Leave on for 5 minutes. Rinse.IngredientsWater/Eau/Aqua, Jojoba Esters, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polycitronellol t-Butyl Ether, Polyglyceryl-10 Decaoleate, Isopentyldiol, Glycerin, C10-18 Triglycerides, Sodium Hyaluronate, Fructose, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behenamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Verbascum Thapsus Extract, Polyporus Umbellatus (Mushroom) Extract, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Lauryl/Myristyl Polyricinoleate, Polyquaternium-11, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Cetyl Alcohol, Bis-(Isostearoyl/Oleoyl Isopropyl) Dimonium Methosulfate, Glyceryl Stearate, Steareth-20, Ceteth-20, PEG-75 Stearate, Fragrance/Parfum, Lactic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shampoo and condition hair. Remove excess water. Generously saturate roots to ends. Leave on for 5 minutes. Rinse.

reviews.headline: I would skip this product
reviews.comments: Bought this product because it was highly starred. Didn't really do anything to my hair.

reviews.headline: No gloss, no shine, just heavy and weird-feeling
reviews.comments: Was hoping to pump up the shine on my hair with this product, but it only left it feeling heavy and weird-feeling - no shine at all.  I love the other products by Living Proof, but this one just didn't perform as expected (or hoped).  I gave this several tries over the course of several months, and couldn't wait each time to wash my hair to get this product out.  And that's where this product went - OUT in the trash.

reviews.headline: Perfect hair Day High-Shine Gloss
reviews.comments: My hair has been looking dull lately due to the weather. However, thanks to this Perfect hair Day High-Shine Gloss, it has been brought back from the dead in just five minutes. It leaves my hair silky and doesn't weigh it down. So before you consider giving up on your locks, try this product. I promise you won't regret it!

reviews.headline: I love this product!!!
reviews.comments: I love this product so much! It is definitely one of my favorite hair care products! I highly recommend it!!

reviews.headline: NOT INCENTIVIZED.. HORRIBLE
reviews.comments: This product is SO bad. Ive used so many hair products soni have experience trying new brands/products. I followed the instructions and i went to blow dry my hair as usual agter and it felt like i have some sort of glue/wax in my hair! When it nornally feels silky smooth.. probably one of the worst prosucts ive ever tried

reviews.headline: Best Gloss Ever
reviews.comments: This is truly the best gloss I have ever used, this is a must have, I love that it only takes 5 minutes and it lasts for weeks.

reviews.headline: So good!!
reviews.comments: Omg such a good product!! I use it in the shower and rinse it after. Makes my hair so shiny. I naturally have dark brown hair and makes my hair look darker close to black blue look. I love ittt!!!!

reviews.headline: This did nothing for my hair, it's mid-tier conditioner
reviews.comments: I have fine, thin, wavy hair, and am always on the lookout for something that can tame flyaways on top of my head without weighing it down or making it look greasy. I was hoping this product might help with that based on reviews. This made no difference to my hair in any way, other than making my scalp get greasy slightly faster if used on the scalp area. It felt like a conditioner on my hair, but didn't leave it feeling particularly moisturized, and didn't seem to make any difference at all to what my hair looked like once dry. The only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 is because it didn't actually damage my hair or anything.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This is a total hair game-changer! It leaves my hair so soft, shiny, and healthy-looking after just one use. I love how it smooths frizz without weighing my hair down, and the gloss lasts for days. It's become a must-have in my hair routine.

reviews.headline: Not content
reviews.comments: This product has a very poignant smell. It did not make a difference in shine. It did make my hair feel thicker though.

reviews.headline: High Hopes, but it's a No Go
reviews.comments: I really had high hopes for this, as I'm a huge Living Proof stan. I followed the directions to use after your conditioner, but unfortunately upon drying it made my hair SO frizzy and very dry in texture. It was definitely not smooth. Don't buy!

reviews.headline: Love this product!!!
reviews.comments: Is product last and it is very natural looking! I love it gives me my shine back!

reviews.headline: Love this product!!!
reviews.comments: Is product last and it is very natural looking! I love it gives me my shine back!

reviews.headline: I'm impressed!
reviews.comments: My processed hair had become so dry and my usual go-to conditioning treatments weren't doing much.  I decided to try a gloss and wow, what a difference. Im definitely a fan.

reviews.headline: would not buy again
reviews.comments: i used it a few times and my hair has only been extremely frizzy. i also have not seen any type of difference sadly, i would not use again

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product so bad! The smell is amazing but after blow drying my hair, my hair felt tacky. I could see some shine left on my hair but it was not worth the tackiness of my hair. I will try it again for when I wear my hair curly but it did not respond good to my hair after blow drying.

reviews.headline: love this product
reviews.comments: i love how shiny it makes my hair just after one use! smells amazing as well

reviews.headline: Perfect Finisher!
reviews.comments:
Really easy to fit this into my normal wash routine! Nice oomph of moisture which helps manageability - good for me since I moved to a dryer climate area not long ago.

I also find I don't have to use it every time I wash my hair to see the benefits. Overall a really solid product if you dig the 90's TV ad hair shine!

reviews.headline: High shine gloss
reviews.comments: I have been using the high shine gloss once every couple of weeks and I feel like it has helped my color last longer. It does provide shine and softness without weighing my hair down.

reviews.headline: Almost Fixed my dry & damaged hair.
reviews.comments:
Here's a review you can use or tweak based on your experience:

Game-Changer for Dry Hair!

I recently discovered this product, and it's been an absolute game-changer for my dry, dull hair. After just one use, my strands felt noticeably smoother and looked so much shinier without feeling weighed down. What I love most is that it doesn't leave a greasy residue—just a silky, salon-fresh finish.

The application was super easy, and the results have been long-lasting. My hair feels healthier, more hydrated, and less prone to frizz. If you're struggling with dryness and want a product that delivers instant and noticeable results, I highly recommend this gloss! It's become a staple in my hair care routine.

media.headline: Nice shine but not mirror shine

faceoff_positive.comments:
I want to start with the packaging of this product. The bottle is stunning. The shimmer to it draws me in every time I see it. Then there's the smell. I'm big on how a product smells. It can be an amazing product but if the smell isn't pleasing to me, I'll sadly stop using it. I'm happy to say the smell of this is so clean and I love it. It's not fruity or flowery smelling. It reminds me of when you leave the salon and your hair smells clean and fresh. 

Now onto the product itself. It's simple to use and rinse out. It's not greasy or oily but feels more like a conditioner. I used my normal styling products afterwards and styled my hair like usual. I do notice a shine to my hair with this. It's similar to when you're under the lights and your hair shimmers. My hair just has this shine to it instead of the dull look. 

I don't wash my hair daily so day two was my test with this. I don't typically reapply any products on day two. I just curl my hair in loose curls and finger comb them out.  My hair was just as shiny and beautiful as day one. It didn't look greasy either. I highly recommend this product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Chef's kiss

faceoff_negative.comments: I have fine, thin, wavy hair, and am always on the lookout for something that can tame flyaways on top of my head without weighing it down or making it look greasy. I was hoping this product might help with that based on reviews. This made no difference to my hair in any way, other than making my scalp get greasy slightly faster if used on the scalp area. It felt like a conditioner on my hair, but didn't leave it feeling particularly moisturized, and didn't seem to make any difference at all to what my hair looked like once dry. The only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 is because it didn't actually damage my hair or anything.
